amendment.description: Amendment requires the EPA to establish a program to encourage domestic production and sales of efficient hybrid and advanced diesel vehicles.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 109-49 to authorize a total of $3 billion over ten years for a program to encourage the domestic production of hybrid and advanced vehicle diesel vehicles by providing grants to manufacturers and incentives to customers to purchase such vehicles.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ford amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
